content.html: TW: These images were passed around a WhatsApp group which included serving and retired Met Police officers. They are not a Police family, they are the UK’s biggest gang. They’ll never have my trust. What Newsnight uncovered is just the tip of the iceberg.
content.value:
TW: These images were passed around a WhatsApp group which included serving and retired Met Police officers.

They are not a Police family, they are the UK’s biggest gang. They’ll never have my trust.

What Newsnight uncovered is just the tip of the iceberg.
